directions: Using an electric mixer on medium-low speed or a whisk, beat cream, powdered sugar, ginger, nutmeg, salt, and 1/4 tsp. cinnamon in a large bowl until medium peaks form. Transfer whipped cream to a serving bowl and top with more cinnamon.
Cream can be made 2 hours ahead; cover and chill.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, plus more for serving
title: Pumpkin Pie–Spice Whipped Cream
